'''Radiant Spincrystal 152''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to a [[Teleport Waypoint]] inside the [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]], [[Natlan]].
